meanings.sent1: The balloon floated in the sky, feeling light and airlike.
meanings.sent2: The chiffon fabric was so delicate and airlike to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The cloud looked so fluffy and airlike, I wanted to jump on it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing and airlike as a cool breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The music filled the room with an airlike quality, making everyone feel weightless.

meanings.definition: Light and airy in texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The meringue was so fluffy and airlike, it practically melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: Her dress flowed around her, billowing in an airlike manner as she danced.
meanings.sent3: The soap bubbles floated in the air, looking so delicate and airlike.
meanings.sent4: The morning mist hung in the valley, creating an airlike veil over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The curtains swayed gently in the breeze, their movements airlike and graceful.
